name: ザ・キング・オブ・ファイターズ 京
summary: The King of Fighters Kyo (ザ・キング・オブ・ファイターズ 京) is a visual novel on the The King of Fighters series developed by Yumekobo and released by SNK on the PlayStation on August 27, 1998. The art for this game was produced by the same illustrator of the manga, Masato Natsumoto. It was re-released for the PSP on June 28, 2007.
